Articles.Content:
There is any mod which add wingmounts (better if it procedural, like b9)???

I mean this:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
That's technically the wing root ( for airliners it's an important bit of area ruling usually ), and pretty much all we can do is make them out of B9 PW & clipped fuselage pieces atm.
You might check Coffee Industries it had some parts like that but it does need updated http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60837-0-23-x-Coffee-Industries-Release-Thread
